attributes.action: encourage diversity by allowing both metric and imperial weights and measures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have no objection to people using metric measures. I don't see why they should object to me using imperial measures.
I'm happy to buy a lb of cheese or a pint of beer, and don't see why I shouldn't. 
Modern electronic scales, and indeed old fashioned balances, are capable of working in either. It seems very stupid to me that I am to be prevented using the weights and measures I'm used to and happy with.
